FuncDef:
The value-added-service enable command enables the value-added service globally.
The undo value-added-service enable command disables the value-added service globally.
By default, the value-added service is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The value-added-service enable command is used to enable value-added services.
Configuration Impact
You must enable the value-added service before configuring and using the value-added service.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
